00025 Astar::Astar(Robot *rob,double dG):
00026         distGoal(dG),
00027         map(NULL),
00028         robot(rob),             
00029         root(NULL),
00030         path(NULL)
00031 {
00032         openList   = new LList;
00033         closedList = new LList; 
00034 }
00036 Astar::Astar():
00037         distGoal(0.01),
00038         map(NULL),

00055 bool Astar :: inObstacle(Point P, double theta)
00056 {
00057         int m,n;
00058         Point det_point;
00059         // Rotates and Translates the check points according to the vehicle position and orientation
00060         for (unsigned int i=0;i<robot->check_points.size();i++)
00061         {
00062                 det_point.setX((robot->check_points[i].x()*cos(theta) - robot->check_points[i].y()*sin(theta) + P.x()));
00063                 det_point.setY((robot->check_points[i].x()*sin(theta) + robot->check_points[i].y()*cos(theta) + P.y()));
00064                 
00065                 map->convert2Pix(&det_point);
00066                 m = (int)(round(det_point.x()));
00067                 n = (int)(round(det_point.y()));
00068                 if (m <= 0 || n <= 0 || m >=map->getWidth() || n >=this->map->getHeight())
00069                         return true;
00070                 if (this->map->grid[m][n])
00071                         return true;
00072         }
00073         return false;
00074 };
00076 
00080 void Astar::findRoot() 
00081 {
00082         SearchSpaceNode * temp;
00083         if(!this->searchSpace)
00084                 return;
00085         double distance,shortest_distance = 100000;
00086         // allocate and setup the root node
00087         root = new Node;        
00088         temp = this->searchSpace;
00089         while(temp!=NULL)
00090         {
00091                 distance = Dist(temp->location,start.p);
00092                 // Initialize the root node information and put it in the open list
00093                 if (distance < shortest_distance) 
00094                 {
00095                         shortest_distance = distance;
00096                         root->pose.p.setX(temp->location.x());
00097                         root->pose.p.setY(temp->location.y());
00098                 }
00099                 temp = temp->next;
00100         }
00101         root->parent = NULL;
00102         root->next = NULL;
00103         root->prev = NULL;
00104         root->g_value = 0;;
00105         root->h_value = gCost(root);
00106         root->f_value = root->g_value + root->h_value;
00107         root->id = 0;
00108         root->depth = 0;
00109         root->pose.phi = start.phi;
00110         root->direction = FORWARD;
00111         //Translate(root->pose,start.phi);
00112         printf("\n      ---->>>Root is Set to be X=%f Y=%f Phi=%f",root->pose.p.x(),root->pose.p.y(),RTOD(root->pose.phi));
00113 };

00121 Node *  Astar::startSearch(Pose start,Pose end, int coord)
00122 {
00123         int      ID = 1;
00124         int      NodesExpanded = 0;
00125         if(this->tree.size() > 0)               
00126                 this->tree.clear();
00127         if(!openList)
00128         {
00129                 openList   = new LList;
00130         }
00131         if(!closedList)
00132         {
00133                 closedList = new LList;                         
00134         }
00135         // Be sure that open and closed lists are empty
00136         openList->Free();
00137         closedList->Free();     
00138         if (!this->searchSpace) // Make sure that we have a map to search
00139         {
00140                 printf("\nRead the map and generate SearchSpace before Searching !!!");
00141                 return NULL;
00142         }
00143         if(coord == PIXEL)
00144         {
00145                 map->convertPix(&start.p);
00146                 map->convertPix(&end.p);
00147         }
00148         this->start.p.setX(start.p.x());
00149         this->start.p.setY(start.p.y());
00150         this->start.phi = start.phi;
00151         this->end.p.setX(end.p.x());
00152         this->end.p.setY(end.p.y());
00153         this->end.phi = end.phi;
00154         printf("\n      --->>> Search Started <<<---");
00155         findRoot();
00156         printf("\n      ---->>>Target is Set to be X=%f Y=%f Phi=%f<<<---",end.p.x(),end.p.y(),RTOD(end.phi));
00157         openList->Add(root);                            // Add the root to OpenList
00158         printf("\n      --->>> Root Added <<<---");
00159         
00160         // while openList is not empty 
00161         while (openList->Start != NULL) 
00162         {
00163                 current = openList->GetHead();  // Get the node with the cheapest cost (first node)
00164                 openList->Next();                               // Move to the next Node
00165         NodesExpanded++;
00166         // We reached the target pose, so build the path and return it.
00167         if (goalReached(current) && current!= root)                     
00168                 {
00169                         // build the complete path to return
00170                         printf("\nLast Node destination: %f %f",current->pose.p.x(),current->pose.p.y());
00171                 current->next = NULL;
00172                 printf("\n      --->>> Goal state reached with :%d nodes created and :%d nodes expanded <<<---",ID,NodesExpanded);
00173                         printf("\n      --->>> General Clean UP <<<---");
00174                         fflush(stdout);
00175 //                      int m=0;
00176 //                      while (p != NULL) 
00177 //                              {
00178 //                                      cout<<"\n       --->>> Step["<<++m<<"] X="<<p->pose.p.x()<<" Y="<<p->pose.p.y();
00179 //                                      //cout<<"\n     --->>> Angle is="<<RTOD(p->angle);
00180 //                                      fflush(stdout);
00181 //                                      p = p->parent;
00182 //                              }
00183 //                      Going up to the Root
00184                         Node * p;
00185                 p = current;
00186                         path = NULL;
00187                         while (p != NULL)
00188                         {
00189 //                              cout<<"\n Am Still HERE Step["<<++m<<"] X="<<p->pose.x<<" Y="<<p->pose.y;
00190 //                              fflush(stdout);
00191                                 // remove the parent node from the closed list (where it has to be)
00192                                 if(p->prev != NULL)
00193                                         (p->prev)->next = p->next;
00194                                 if(p->next != NULL)
00195                                         (p->next)->prev = p->prev;
00196                                 // check if we're removing the top of the list
00197                                 if(p == closedList->Start)
00198                                         closedList->Next();
00199                                 // set it up in the path
00200                                 p->next = path;                         
00201                                 path = p;
00202                                 p = p->parent;
00203                         }
00204                 // now delete all nodes on OPEN and Closed Lists
00205                         printf("\n      --->>> Freeing open list <<<---");      fflush(stdout);
00206                         openList->Free();
00207                         printf("\n      --->>> DONE  <<<---");                          fflush(stdout);
00208                         printf("\n      --->>> Freeing closed list <<<---");    fflush(stdout);
00209                         closedList->Free();
00210                         printf("\n      --->>> DONE  <<<---");
00211                 return path;    // Path Found Successfully
00212         }
00213         
00214         // Create List of Children for the current NODE
00215                 if(!(childList = makeChildrenNodes(current))) // No more Children => Search Ended Unsuccessfully at this path Branch
00216                 {
00217                         printf("\n      --->>> Search Ended On this Branch / We Reached a DEAD END <<<---");
00218                 }
00219                 // insert the children into the OPEN list according to their f values
00220         while (childList != NULL)                     
00221                 {
00222                     curChild  = childList;
00223                         childList = childList->next;
00224                     // set up the rest of the child node details
00225                         curChild->parent = current;
00226                         curChild->depth  = current->depth + 1;
00227                         curChild->id = ID++;
00228                         //printf("ID is:%d",ID);
00229                         curChild->next = NULL;
00230                         curChild->prev = NULL;
00231                         curChild->g_value = gCost(curChild);
00232                 curChild->h_value = hCost(curChild);
00233                         curChild->f_value = curChild->g_value + curChild->h_value;
00234                         Node * p;
00235                         // check if the child is already in the open list
00236                         if( (p = openList->Find(curChild)))
00237                         {
00238                                 if (p->f_value <= curChild->f_value && (p->direction == curChild->direction))       
00239                                 {
00240                                 freeNode(curChild);
00241                                         curChild = NULL;
00242                                 }
00243                                 // the child is a shorter path to this point, delete p from  the closed list
00244                                 else 
00245                                 if (p->f_value > curChild->f_value && (p->direction == curChild->direction))
00246                                 {
00247                                         openList->Remove(p);
00248                                         //cout<<"\n     --->>> Opened list -- Node is deleted, current child X="<<curChild->pose.x<<" Y="<<curChild->pose.y<<" has shorter path<<<---";
00249                                         fflush(stdout);
00250 
00251                                 }
00252                         }
00253                         // test whether the child is in the closed list (already been there)                    
00254                         if (curChild)
00255                         {
00256                                 if((p = closedList->Find(curChild)))
00257                                 {
00258                                         if (p->f_value <= curChild->f_value && p->direction == curChild->direction)       
00259                                         {
00260                                         freeNode(curChild);
00261                                                 curChild = NULL;
00262                                         }
00263                                         // the child is a shorter path to this point, delete p from  the closed list
00264                                         else 
00265                                         {
00266                                                 /* This is the tricky part, it rarely happens, but in my case it happenes all the time :s
00267                                                  * Anyways, we are here cause we found a better path to a node that we already visited, we will have to
00268                                                  * Update the cost of that node and ALL ITS DESCENDENTS because their cost is parent dependent ;)
00269                                                  * Another Solution is simply to comment everything and do nothing, doing this, the child will be added to the
00270                                                  * Open List and it will be investigated further later on.
00271                                                  */
00272                                                 //TODO : this SHOULD be fixed, very very DODGY
00273 //                                              Node *ptr = closedList->Start;
00274 //                                              while(ptr)
00275 //                                              {
00276 //                                                      if(ptr->parent == p)
00277 //                                                              ptr->parent = NULL;
00278 //                                                      ptr = ptr->next;
00279 //                                              }
00280 //                                              closedList->Remove(p);
00281                                                 //cout<<"\n     --->>> Closed list -- Node is deleted, current child X="<<curChild->pose.x<<" Y="<<curChild->pose.y<<" has shorter path<<<---";
00282                                                 fflush(stdout);
00283         
00284                                         }                                       
00285                                 }
00286                         }
00287                         // ADD the child to the OPEN List
00288                         if (curChild)
00289                         {
00290                                 openList->Add(curChild);
00291                         }                       
00292         }
00293                 // put the current node onto the closed list, ==>> already visited List
00294                 closedList->Add(current);
00295                 // Test to see if we have expanded too many nodes without a solution
00296         if (current->id > this->MAXNODES)       
00297                 {
00298                 printf("\n      --->>>  Expanded %d Nodes which is more than the maximum allowed MAXNODE=%ld , Search Terminated",current->id,MAXNODES);
00299                         //Delete Nodes in Open and Closed Lists
00300                         closedList->Free();
00301                         openList->Free();
00302                         path = NULL;
00303                         return path; // Expanded more than the maximium nodes state
00304         }
00305         }       //...  end of OPEN loop
00306         
00307         /* if we got here, then there is no path to the goal
00308          *  delete all nodes on CLOSED since OPEN is now empty
00309          */
00310         closedList->Free();
00311         printf("\n      --->>>No Path Found<<<---");
00312         return NULL; // No Path Found
00313 };

00316 
00322 double Astar:: gCost(Node *n) 
00323 {
00324         double cost;
00325         if(n == NULL || n->parent==NULL)
00326                 return 0.0;
00327         cost = n->parent->g_value + Dist(n->pose.p,n->parent->pose.p);
00328         return cost;
00329 };
00330 
00332 
00339 double Astar::hCost(Node *n) 
00340 {
00341         double h=0,angle_cost=0,obstacle_penalty=0,reverse_penalty=0,delta_d=0;
00342         if(n == NULL)
00343                 return(0);
00344         // Using the Euclidean distance
00345         h = Dist(end.p,n->pose.p);
00346         //h = 0;
00347         if (n->parent != NULL) // Adding the Angle cost, we have to uniform the angle representation to the +ve rep or we well get a non sense result
00348         {
00349                 double a,b;
00350                 a = n->pose.phi;
00351                 b = n->parent->pose.phi;
00352                 angle_cost = fabs(anglediffs(a,b)); // in radians
00353                 delta_d = Dist(n->pose.p,n->parent->pose.p);
00354         }
00355         obstacle_penalty = n->nearest_obstacle;
00356         if(n->direction == BACKWARD)
00357                 reverse_penalty = delta_d;
00358         
00359         // 0.555 is the AXLE Length 
00360 //      return ( h*(1 + reverse_penalty ) + 0.555 * angle_cost + obstacle_penalty*delta_d);
00361         return ( 1 + reverse_penalty )*( h + delta_d + 0.555 * angle_cost + 0.555*angle_cost*obstacle_penalty*delta_d );
00362 };
00364 
00367 bool Astar :: goalReached (Node *n) 
00368 {
00369         double angle_diff, delta_d;
00370         delta_d = Dist(n->pose.p,end.p);
00371         if (n->direction == FORWARD)
00372                 angle_diff =    anglediff(end.phi,n->pose.phi);
00373         else
00374         {
00375                 angle_diff =    anglediff(end.phi,n->pose.phi + M_PI);
00376         }
00377         if ( delta_d <= distGoal && angle_diff <= DTOR(60))
00378         {
00379 //              cout<<" \n Desired Final Orientation ="<<RTOD(end.phi)<<" Current="<<RTOD(n->pose.phi);
00380 //              cout<<"\n Reached Destination with Diff Orientation="<< RTOD(angle_diff);
00381                 return 1;
00382         }
00383         return 0;
00384 };
00386 
00392 Node *Astar :: makeChildrenNodes(Node *parent)
00393 {
00394         Point P; 
00395         Node  *p, *q;
00396         SearchSpaceNode *temp;
00397         double start_angle,end_angle,angle,angle_difference,discrete_angle,robot_angle,child_angle,angle_resolution = DTOR(10);
00398         bool collides = FALSE;
00399         int direction;
00400         P.setX(parent->pose.p.x());
00401         P.setY(parent->pose.p.y());
00402         Tree t;
00403         t.location = P;
00404         if(!searchSpace)
00405                 return NULL;
00406         temp = searchSpace;
00407         // Locate the Cell in the Search Space, necessary to determine the neighbours
00408         while(temp!=NULL)
00409         {
00410                 //printf("Node has %d children x=%f y=%f",temp->children.size(),temp->pose.x(),temp->pose.y());         
00411                 if (temp->location == P)
00412                         break;
00413                 temp = temp->next;
00414         }
00415         if (!temp) 
00416         {
00417             printf("\n  --->>>  Node not found in the search Space ");
00418                 return NULL;
00419         }
00420         q = NULL;
00421         // Check Each neighbour
00422         //printf("WHAT??? %d x=%f y=%f",temp->children.size(),P.x(),P.y());
00423         for (unsigned int i=0;i<temp->children.size();i++) 
00424         {
00425                 /* 
00426                  * Check what what as the Robot's direction of motion and see
00427                  * if we it's easier to go forward or backwards to the child
00428                  */
00429                 if (parent->direction == FORWARD)
00430                         robot_angle = parent->pose.phi;
00431                 else
00432                         robot_angle = parent->pose.phi + M_PI;          
00433                 // What will be our orientation when we go to this child node ?
00434                 angle = ATAN2(temp->children[i]->location,P);
00435                 // How much it differs from our current orientations ?
00436                 angle_difference = anglediff(angle,parent->pose.phi);
00437                 // Are we gonna turn too much ? if yes then why not go backwards ?
00438                 if (angle_difference > DTOR(120))
00439                 {
00440                         //cout<<"\n Angle difference ="<<RTOD(angle_difference)<<" parent angle="<<RTOD(parent->angle)<<" destination angle="<<RTOD(angle);
00441                         direction = parent->direction * -1;
00442                 }
00443                 else
00444                 {
00445                         direction = parent->direction;
00446                 }
00447                 collides = FALSE;
00448                 /* Discreatize the turning space and check for collison
00449                  * 1- Angle stored in the node is the direction of the PATH (NOT THE ROBOT)
00450                  * 2- If we were moving Forward then the Robot direction is the same as the Path
00451                  * 3- If we were moving BackWard then the Robot direction is Path + M_PI
00452                  * 4- Determine what will the Robot orientation will be at this step
00453                  * 5- Check for collision detection with a certain resolution
00454                  */
00455                 if (direction == FORWARD)
00456                         child_angle = angle;
00457                 else
00458                         child_angle = angle + M_PI;
00459                 if(robot_angle  < 0 ) robot_angle  += 2*M_PI;
00460                 if(child_angle  < 0 ) child_angle  += 2*M_PI;
00461                 // Start from the largest angle and go down
00462                 if (robot_angle > child_angle)
00463                 {
00464                         start_angle  = robot_angle;
00465                         end_angle    = child_angle;
00466                 }
00467                 else
00468                 {
00469                         start_angle  = child_angle;
00470                         end_angle    = robot_angle;
00471                 }
00472         discrete_angle =  start_angle;
00473                 //cout<<"\n Start is"<<RTOD(start_angle)<<" End angle="<<RTOD(end_angle);
00474 //              angle_difference = anglediff(start_angle,end_angle);
00475                 for (int s=0 ; s <= ceil(angle_difference/angle_resolution); s++)
00476                 {
00477                         if (inObstacle(temp->children[i]->location,discrete_angle))
00478                         {
00479                                 collides= true;
00480                                 break;
00481                         }
00482                         if(Abs(start_angle - end_angle) >= DTOR(180))
00483                         {
00484                                 discrete_angle += angle_resolution;
00485                                 if (discrete_angle > 2*M_PI)
00486                                         discrete_angle-= 2*M_PI;
00487                                 if(discrete_angle > end_angle)
00488                                         discrete_angle = end_angle;                                                     
00489                         }
00490                         else
00491                         {
00492                                 discrete_angle -= angle_resolution;
00493                                 if (discrete_angle < end_angle)
00494                                         discrete_angle = end_angle;
00495                         }
00496                 }
00497                 if (!collides) // if after discretization the child still doens't collide then add it
00498                 {
00499                         p = new Node;
00500                         p->pose.p.setX(temp->children[i]->location.x());
00501                         p->pose.p.setY(temp->children[i]->location.y());
00502                         p->direction  = direction ;
00503                         t.children.push_back(p->pose.p);
00504                         p->nearest_obstacle = temp->children[i]->obstacle_cost;
00505                         p->parent = parent;
00506                         p->pose.phi = angle;
00507                         //p->wheelchair.SetCheckPoints(this->number_of_point_to_check,this->points_to_check);
00508                         p->next = q;
00509                         q = p;
00510                 //cout<<"\n NEW CHILD ADDED";
00511                 }
00512         }
00513         // Save the search tree so that it can be displayed later
00514         if (t.children.size() > 0)
00515                 tree.push_back(t);
00516         return q;
00517 }
00518 // Free node function
00519 void Astar :: freeNode(Node *n) 
00520 {
00521         delete n;
00522 }
